desc: Progen Fiberbond is an instant solution to the age-old problem of hair loss and thinning in men and women. Our Fibers blend seamlessly with your own hair to fill in thinning areas and conceal hair loss. FormaFlex Technology allows the fibers to intuitively move and flex with the hair to create a seamless look.

layout.text: Fiberbond Keratin Thickening Fibers blend seamlessly with your own hair to fill in thinning areas and conceal hair loss.
